campaign_list.title: Your campaigns
campaign_list.text: Club members will be reposting your content until the budget is fully spent. Unspent amounts will be returned after campaign ends.

claim_account.success: The admin will hand over control of your account to you soon.
claim_account.error: Oops, we could not receive your request. Please try again or contact the admin on X.

advertiser_help.title: Fund, Boost, Grow.
advertiser_help.text: Get more impressions on your posts by launching a campaign. You’ll choose a post, set a budget, and reach real people through authentic reposts. Eligible collaborators are paid based on their genuine influence and audience size, helping you achieve meaningful reach.

community.title: Your community.
community.description: These members helped amplify your campaigns! Pick your favorites to invite them to exclusive ones — or flag those you’d rather not work with again.

collab_list.title: Your collaboration history
collab_list.text: These are your collaborations so far

REGISTERED.title: Registered
REGISTERED.text: We saw your collab, we're validating it.

FAILED.title: Failed
FAILED.text: The campaign ran out of budget. You can undo your collaboration :(

campaign_request.title: Suggest a campaign
campaign_request.text: Got a campaign idea for X? Share it with us! If approved, we'll launch it, and you'll earn Asami tokens for each repost.

errors.not_a_post_url: The link you provided does not appear to be an X post.
errors.invalid_url: The link must point to a post, and start with https://...

with_stripe.title: Use Stripe
with_stripe.text: You can fund your campaign using a credit or debit card. A portion of your budget will go to payment processing fees, and you won’t receive Asami tokens — but collaborators will still be paid in DOC, just like with on-chain campaigns.
with_stripe.form_title: What to know before you launch.
with_stripe.service_summary:
Campaigns paid via Stripe include a 20% fee for processing and budget management. The rest is converted to DOC and fully used to fund your campaign and reward collaborators. You may want to consider funding directly in DOC to avoid this fee. Campaigns run until the full budget is spent, with collaborators paid based on their influence to help you reach the most relevant audiences.
Please note: there are no refunds — even if you're not satisfied with the results. We recommend starting with a small $50 budget to see how Asami works for your goals.

done.title: One Last Step
done.text: We’ve received your campaign details. All that’s left is to complete the payment. Once we receive it, your campaign may take up to 24 hours to go live.

with_doc.title: Use DOC
with_doc.claim_to_use: Funding your campaign with DOC is 20% cheaper and earns you Asami tokens for every repost. DOC is a fully decentralized stablecoin on the Rootstock blockchain, so you’ll need a compatible wallet — like Beexo, MetaMask, Enkrypt, or Rabby — to use it.
with_doc.claim_in_progress: Linking your wallet... Soon you'll be able to create campaigns and enjoy all the benefits of using DOC — including lower costs and Asami rewards.
with_doc.create_text: Want more for your budget? Use DOC to launch campaigns at lower cost and collect Asami tokens with every collaboration.
with_doc.doc_funded: You don't have any DOC in your wallet yet. To get started, you can mint it using RBTC or swap for it using supported protocols.
with_doc.form_title: What to know before you launch.
with_doc.service_summary:
Your campaign will go live as soon as it’s submitted. Your wallet may ask for DOC spending authorization before it can proceed. Campaigns run for 15 days, and any unused DOC will be automatically returned to your wallet at the end.
Collaborators are paid in DOC based on their influence level, which helps you reach the most relevant audiences.
Please note: there are no refunds — even if you're not satisfied with the results. We recommend starting with a small 30 DOC budget to see how Asami works for your goals.

done.title: Campaign created
done.text: Your campaign has been created. It may take a few minutes to show up in your dashboard.

make_campaign.pay_members: Pay club members to repost any X post.

errors.budget_too_low: Budget is too low, must be at least 1 DOC
errors.price_per_point_not_a_number: Price per impression is not a number
errors.price_per_point_too_low: Price per impression is too low
errors.max_too_low: Maximum individual reward is too low
errors.max_not_a_number: Maximum individual reward is not a number
errors.min_too_low: Minimum individual reward is too low
errors.min_not_a_number: Minimum individual reward is not a number
errors.not_a_post_url: The link you provided does not appear to be an X post.
errors.invalid_url: The link must point to a post, and start with https://...

form_step.content_url_help: Paste the link here. Find it on the “Share Post” menu on X. Need help?
form_step.budget_help: Minimum is 1 DOC, but we usually recommend 30–250 DOC.
form_step.managed_amount_help: Minimum is $10, but we usually recommend $50–$300.
form_step.price_per_point_help: Sets how much to reward for reach. Each point estimates one person getting your message. 0.01 means you pay 10 DOC for approximately 1,000 people meaningfully reached.
form_step.max_individual_reward_help: No one earns more than this total, no matter their reach.
form_step.min_individual_reward_help: Useful to support smaller collaborators with guaranteed pay.
form_step.topics_help: Leave this blank to allow everyone.
form_step.thumbs_up_only_help: Only visible to collaborators you have approved.

tx_waiter.approving_text: Go to your wallet and approve spending your campaign's budget.
tx_waiter.creating_text: Now got to your wallet again and sign the transaction that will create your campaign in ASAMI.

failure_step.action_rejected: It looks like you cancelled the campaign creation in your wallet, try again if you're still interested.
failure_step.wrong_signer: Did you change your wallet account? You are using Asami with %{expected} but your wallet is using %{actual}. Switch your wallet connected account to %{expected} and try again.
failure_step.unexpected_error: An unexpected error ocurred, contact us on X and forward the error information.
failure_step.info_copied: Error details copied to your clipboard
failure_step.title: Campaign creation cancelled

hide_campaign.title: Ignoring campaign
hide_campaign.content: We won't show this campaign again, this cannot be undone.

x.attempted: Now just wait, your repost may take up to an hour to register in Asami.

title_card.title: Pick, Share, Earn.
title_card.collaborate: You're all set to collaborate! Just remember — your audience is paying attention, so be a bit selective. Reposting content that doesn’t align with you can wear out your followers and weaken your influence. Plus, staying true to your voice shows you're sharing responsibly.
title_card.verify_handles: Let’s link your X account so we can estimate your influence. Once you're verified, you can start earning from reposts!
title_card.wait_for_campaigns: No campaigns available right now — check back soon, new opportunities pop up all the time, specially on fridays!

grant_permissions_and_make_posts.summary: Connect your X account to get your personalized influence reading. It’s fun, and lets you join campaigns on X to earn crypto for reposting.
grant_permissions_and_make_posts.we_will_check_your_activity: We’ll check your X activity to measure your audience and influence based on interactions.
grant_permissions_and_make_posts.we_will_post_a_poll: We’ll post a poll on your behalf so your audience can rate your influence, you can opt-out by deleting it right away, but it may affect your score.
grant_permissions_and_make_posts.you_will_earn_rewards: After that, you’ll see campaigns you can repost to start earning rewards.
grant_permissions_and_make_posts.you_can_revoke: You can revoke permissions anytime on X, and reset your influence.
grant_permissions_and_make_posts.help_text: Need help? Ask our chatbot or join our Telegram group.

in_progress.summary: We are measuring your influnce @%{username}, it may take up to one hour.
in_progress.may_take_up_to_an_hour: It may take up to an hour for your score to be ready.
in_progress.check_the_poll: In the meantime, check your X profile to see the poll we just posted for you — your audience’s votes will help shape your score!

grant_permissions_again.summary: We've lost access to your x account. Reconnect to keep collaborating.
grant_permissions_again.dialog_title: We've Lost Access to Your X Account
grant_permissions_again.cant_measure: We can’t measure your influence right now, so your score will be reset to 0.
grant_permissions_again.please_reconnect: Please reconnect your X account to restore access and continue collaborating in campaigns.

account_deactivated.summary: Your handle has been deactivated by the campaign manager due to infringement.

unclaimed.title: You're earning, but not withdrawing
unclaimed.not_requested: You're using a managed account — no wallet needed for now. When you’re ready, connect your RSK wallet to take full control. Your funds will move to a smart contract only you can access. Just keep your wallet safe — lost wallets mean lost funds.
unclaimed.pending: Hang tight — your wallet is being linked. You’ll be able to manage and withdraw your rewards as soon as it’s ready.

claimed.title: Rewards
claimed.not_added: %{symbol} could not be added to your wallet.
claimed.suggest_gasless: We deduct 1 DOC, you get your unclaimed balances and 0.000006 RBTC in your wallet.
claimed.no_pending_balance: Your rewards will go to your unclaimed balance, then you can claim them here.
claimed.cant_withdraw: You're low on RBTC for this claim. We can process your claim ind send you some extra RBTC for 1 DOC of your unclaimed balance. Keep stacking rewards!
claimed.claim_success: Your tokens are on their way.

login.unexpected_error: An unexpected error ocurred while starting your session
login.error_description_title: We have a description for the error:

your_post_here.title: Boost your posts with word-of-mouth energy.
your_post_here.message: Boost your engagement with word-of-mouth energy. Asami adds real reposts to your ad strategy — campaigns can be funded with crypto or credit card.
your_post_here.one: Asami puts your Web3 project in front of real people who choose to repost you on X — building reach now and community over time.
your_post_here.two: Pay with DOC — or with a Credit Card if you must.

join_now.title: Get your personalized influence reading.
join_now.one: Asami reveals your reach — and rewards you for using it.
join_now.two: Pick Web3 campaigns worth amplifying, repost them on X, and earn DOC stablecoin and ASAMI tokens. You’ll only need a wallet to cash out.

login_form.read_our_terms: Read our terms. If you agree, choose how you'd like to log in.

x_mobile_warning.title: X login doesn’t always work on mobile.
x_mobile_warning.text: This happens when the X app opens instead of your browser. If it doesn't work, try logging in from a laptop, use Email or Web3 instead, or temporarily disable link handling in the X app settings so the login opens in your mobile browser.

send_email_token.title: Type your email and we'll send you a login link.
send_email_token.error: We couldn’t send the code. Contact us on X at @asami_club if the issue continues.
send_email_token.done_contact_us: It might take a few minutes to arrive — please wait up to 10 minutes and check your spam folder. If it still hasn’t arrived, contact us on X at @asami_club.

login_disclaimer.title: How things work here
login_disclaimer.heads_up: Just a quick heads-up before you join
login_disclaimer.asami_operates_differently: — Asami operates differently from typical websites due to its blockchain-based fairness and transparency model.
login_disclaimer.data_outside_the_eu: Your data may be transferred outside the EU and stored forever, given our legitimate interest in blockchain transparency.
login_disclaimer.no_guarantees: The service is provided as is, with no guarantees of suitability for any specific purpose, and may be changed or discontinued at any time.
login_disclaimer.local_laws: You are responsible for ensuring your asami usage complies with local laws and third-party platform terms — like X. We haven’t run into any issues ourselves, but we include this just to cover our bases.

about_us.privacy_statement_title: We have an important privacy statement to make.
privacy_statement: As part of our commitment to fostering a transparent, trustworthy, and fair community, we have specific policies regarding member data that you should be aware of before joining.

1. Access to Participant Information Upon joining, please be informed that all participants will have access to certain details about other participants and their interactions within the club. This includes social media handles, rewards received, campaigns created, and their vote in governance aspects.

2. Permanence of Data: It is crucial to our community's integrity that we maintain a permanent record of interactions and member details. Therefore, once you provide any information to the club, it will be retained indefinitely in the RSK blockchain.

3. No Option for Erasure or Amendment: Please understand that once your data is submitted to the club, you will not have the option to erase or amend this information. This is in line with our policy of maintaining a lasting record for transparency and fairness among all members. It is also a technical impediment arising from the usage of a public blockchain network which replicates data worldwide.

4. Public Availability and Potential Risks: By agreeing to join our club, you acknowledge and consent that all data you provide will be made publicly available worldwide, in perpetuity. We advise you to consider the potential impact this could have on your privacy and reputation.

5. Informed Consent: Your decision to join the club signifies your acceptance of these terms. We believe this policy is essential to attract new members who value transparency, ensure fair treatment for all, and maintain the high level of trust within our community.

Please take a moment to consider these points carefully. By joining ASAMI you agree to these terms regarding your data. We are excited to have you as part of our community and are committed to upholding these principles to create a positive and open environment for all members.
about_us.data_rights_title: About this website and your data rights.
data_rights: This website serves as an interface for engaging with the ASAMI smart contract and participating in the club. The personal information we collect from you is solely for these purposes.
Given the worldwide nature of the public blockchain that enforces the ASAMI smart contract between participants, you must consent to permanetly disclose and store your data globally.
This means you'll be transferring your data to jurisdictions outside the european union that have no data protection guarantees.

You may not be able to have your data amended, or deleted. Your full history of interactions with other participants such as members, advertisers and votes, and also your collected rewards will be publicly available to anyone, forever.

This site is developed and run by Constata EU Digital Trust Services S.L., registered in Spain with C.I.F. nº B02983997, Headquartered in Calle Paseo de la Castellana 40, 8ª planta, Madrid, 28046, Spain, and registered in Registro Mercantil de Madrid, Tomo 41408, folio 174, Hoja M 733896,

If you have any question about the risks associated with global blockchain disclosure, or wish to exercise your data protection rights in aspects managed by this website, you can contact us at dpo@constata.eu.

stats.title: Club Stats
stats.description: Global club stats at a glance — for specifics, check each section in the navbar.

campaigns.title: Campaigns
campaigns.description: These are all the campaigns ever created by advertisers.

handles.title: Handles
handles.description: These are the handles that engage in collabs. They are scored by the campaign manager.

accounts.title: Members
accounts.description: Club members that can be making campaigns, collaborating, or both.

collabs.title: Collaborations
collabs.description: A collaboration occurs when a Handle reposts, participating on a Campaign

oracle.title: Oracle Jobs
oracle.description: These are this campaign manager's on-chain jobs. This is the only campaign manager so far.

oauth_redirect.logging_you_in: Logging you in, this won't take long.
oauth_redirect.invalid_redirect_state: This link has expired or the redirect url is invalid. Did you copy it manually?. Please try again.
oauth_redirect.unexpected_error: An unexpected error ocurred while starting your session
oauth_redirect.error_description_title: We have a description for the error:
oauth_redirect.x_grant_access_success: Success! We're verifying your influence now — you’ll be able to join campaigns shortly.
oauth_redirect.x_gant_access_error: We couldn’t link your X account. Please try again, or contact support if the issue persists.

online_engagement.title: Online engagement
online_engagement.average: Engagement on X is okay, but has room to grow. %{extra}
online_engagement.high: Engagement on X is high, the audience is tuned in. %{extra}
online_engagement.none: We could not detect authentic engagement on X. %{extra}

audience_poll.title: Audience poll
audience_poll.high: An audience poll shows high influence. %{extra}
audience_poll.average: An audience poll shows moderate influence. %{extra}
audience_poll.reverse: An audience poll shows contentious influence. %{extra}

account_show.banned_text: X is limiting this account's reach. %{extra}
account_show.verified_text: This account has improved reach on X. %{extra}
account_show.referrer_text: User has referred other high scored members. %{extra}
account_show.holder_text: Is commited to the cause, holding ASAMI tokens. %{extra}
account_show.ghost_text: Doesn't talk much, and/or gets few impressions.
account_show.repost_fatigue_text: User reposts too much, people can't keep up.
account_show.indeterminate_audience_text: Can't tell if their audience is real or bots.
account_show.followed_text: Is verified, and has a high ratio of verified followers.
account_show.liked_text: Gets many likes per impression on posts.
account_show.replied_text: A lot of people reply to this user's posts.
account_show.reposted_text: Audience can’t resist the urge to repost.
account_show.mentioned_text: Was recently mentioned on high visibility posts.

landing.title: A Club for WEB3 Trends.
landing.asami_invites: Asami connects projects with real people who amplify their message through meaningful social sharing.
landing.boost: Advertisers grow through genuine reach. Collaborators add value by choosing what to amplify and getting rewarded for their influence.
landing.together: We’re still so early. Let’s bring the next billion people into Web3 — together.

about_token.title: Get ASAMI Tokens
about_token.text: Support the project and earn passively—no need to run campaigns or collaborate. With a fixed supply of 21 million tokens and no premine, ASAMI holders receive a share of club fees every 15 days.
